author: thegreatpeter
content: readme.md create simple icondownload colorize branded svg icons a snap!create simple icon leverages power simple icons then colorizes anyway 'd .installation$ yarn global add create-simple-icon you're using yarn yet:$ npm install -g create-simple-iconusage, options examplesusage $ csi <icon-name> <icon-color>examples csi twitter red csi facebook '#eee' (zsh requires quotes) csi reddit (returns default color) csi reddit -p (opens reddit your browser) csi -b (opens simpleicons.org your browser)requirementsnode 6+
